definition: report of success/report of a victory
Czech/Czech Republic/abbr. for 捷克[Jie2 ke4]
victory/triumph/quick/nimble/prompt
to announce/to inform/report/newspaper/recompense/revenge/CL:份[fen4],張|张[zhang1]
victory reports pour in (idiom); news of success in an endless stream

sentences.english: We found the poster on a partition door in the Villa of the East Garden.
sentences.chinese: 在東園別墅的一道隔扇門上，我們找到了那張捷報。

sentences.english: LATELY, pleasant surprises about European economies have been popping up with happy regularity.
sentences.chinese: 近來，關於歐洲經濟的捷報頻傳。

sentences.english: Around the world, success is spreading rapidly, and hope, which breeds further success, quickly follows.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地捷報頻傳，新的希望正孕育着進一步的成功。
